summary.span: 支持使用 对象的 或 访问器访问该对象的属性值。

span.span: Provides access to the property values of a object using its or accessors.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean
public: property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 元素的值是否为只读。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the value of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is read-only.

value.span: 如果值为只读，则为 ；如果它可以修改，则为 。

span.span: if the value is read-only; if it can be modified.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件应将其设置为`true`并将其设置为`false`的创建之前对象。A control should have its set to `true` and its set to `false` prior to the creation of a object. ## Examples 在以下示例中，支持控件模式的特定于控件的具有其值递增或递减值。In the following example, an that supports the control pattern has its value incremented or decremented by the control-specific value. [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103LargeChange](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#103largechange)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103LargeChange](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#103largechange)] [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#103)] [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#101)]

public: property double LargeChange { double get(); };

summary.span: 获取将与 属性相加或相减的特定于控件的显著更改值。

span.span: Gets the control-specific large-change value which is added to or subtracted from the property.

value.span: 显著更改值，如果该元素不支持 则为 。

span.span: The large-change value or if the element does not support .
The default value is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在以下示例中，支持控件模式的特定于控件的具有其值递增或递减值。In the following example, an that supports the control pattern has its value incremented or decremented by the control-specific value. summary.span: 获取 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 元素支持的最大范围值。

span.span: Gets the maximum range value supported by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.

value.span: 支持的最大值[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素或如果元素不支持。

span.span: The maximum value supported by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or if the element does not support .
The default value is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在以下示例中，支持控件模式都具有其值设置为特定于控件的最大值。In the following example, an that supports the control pattern has its value set to the control-specific maximum value. summary.span: 获取小更改值，该值对于 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 元素是唯一的，元素的 属性将加上或减去此值。

span.span: Gets the small-change value, unique to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element, which is added to or subtracted from the elements property.

value.span: 唯一的小更改值[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素或如果元素不支持。

span.span: The small-change value unique to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or if the element does not support .
The default value is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在以下示例中，支持控件模式的特定于控件的具有其值递增或递减值。In the following example, an that supports the control pattern has its value incremented or decremented by the control-specific value. summary.span: 获取 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 元素的当前值。

value.span: 当前值[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素或如果元素不支持。

span.span: The current value of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or if the element does not support .
The default value is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在以下示例中，获取从目标控件的对象传递到函数用于检索当前属性值。In the following example, a object obtained from a target control is passed into a function that retrieves the current property values. [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#102)]
